name: Gumroad Shortcode
author: Zach Silveira

sections.description:
This plugin integrates with Gumroad.com by using their javascript modal view. On install, this plugin will include the JS required to load gumroad products on any page of your site with the use of the shortcode. This makes it easy to sell products using Gumroad right on your own WordPress site!

Example:
[gumroad url=”http://gum.co/tweets” title=”Specific Tweets Plugin”]
url is the link to your product page
title is the title of the link

short_description: Simple plugin that shows gumroad products on any page
